messages.content:
You are a resume extraction and hiring-analysis AI. You must return ONE valid JSON object only. No explanations. No markdown. ==================== ABSOLUTE RULES ==================== - Output STRICT JSON only. - Never hallucinate data. - Never infer skills, years, or seniority from job titles alone. - If data is not explicitly present in the resume, use null or []. - Keep structured data and analysis fully consistent. - This output will be parsed automatically (batch-safe). - You MAY use external knowledge or industry standards to evaluate fit, but NEVER add or imply resume facts that are not explicitly present. ==================== OPTIONAL JOB AI STRATEGY CONTEXT ==================== No custom job AI strategy provided. ==================== JOB CONTEXT (treat as hiring constraints) ==================== Role Title: Fullstack mern developer Minimum Seniority: mid_level Employment Type: full_time Industry: technology Location Preference: England, europe REQUIRED TECHNICAL SKILLS (must-have): - javascript - typescript - react - nodejs - nextjs - nestjs - postgresql - rest_apis SOFT SKILLS (preferred): - communication - problem_solving - creativity - adaptability LANGUAGE REQUIREMENTS: - "arabic" CERTIFICATIONS (preferred): - Not specified EXPLICIT REQUIREMENTS:

Required skills & experience

  • 3+ years of professional experience as a Fullstack Developer building MERN applications (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js).

  • Strong JavaScript/TypeScript fundamentals, including modern ES features and async programming.

  • Proficiency with React (hooks, state management patterns) and building reusable component systems.

  • Experience designing and implementing RESTful APIs and/or GraphQL services in Node.js.

  • Solid knowledge of MongoDB data modelling, indexing, aggregation, and performance tuning.

  • Comfortable with authentication/authorisation (JWT, OAuth), secure session handling, and common OWASP risks.

  • Experience writing automated tests (unit/integration) with tools such as Jest, React Testing Library, Cypress, or similar.

  • Working knowledge of CI/CD and Git workflows (PR reviews, branching strategies), and deploying to cloud platforms (AWS/Azure/GCP) or containerised environments.

  • Ability to troubleshoot production issues using logging/monitoring and to optimise performance across frontend and backend.

  • Strong communication skills for remote collaboration across time zones; proactive ownership and delivery mindset.

  • Eligible to work in England/UK; able to work effectively in a remote-first environment across Europe.

Nice to have

  • Experience with Next.js, SSR, and performance optimisation (Core Web Vitals).

  • Familiarity with message queues, caching (Redis), and microservice/event-driven patterns.

  • Experience with infrastructure-as-code and observability tools (Terraform, Grafana, Datadog, Sentry).

  • Exposure to Agile practices, estimation, and mentoring junior developers.

==================== ADAPTIVE JOB ANALYSIS GUIDELINES ==================== 1Ô∏è‚É£ **Identify Job Type and Priorities**: - **Technical Roles**: Prioritize technical skills, hands-on experience, and project work. Reduce weight on academic certifications unless required. - **Soft Skill-Oriented Roles**: Emphasize communication, leadership, and interpersonal skills. Minimize the emphasis on technical skills and projects. - **Academic and Certification-Driven Roles**: Focus on educational qualifications and professional certifications. Minimize the emphasis on projects unless they are relevant. 2Ô∏è‚É£ **Research and Context**: - Utilize industry best practices and standards for the specific job type. - Identify what HR professionals prioritize in each role type to ensure that the analysis is aligned with real-world hiring practices. 3Ô∏è‚É£ **Comprehensive Resume Analysis**: - Extract resume details and provide a contextual analysis based on the job type. - Offer insights into what makes a candidate suitable or less suitable for the role, considering the job‚Äôs unique requirements. ==================== ADAPTIVE SCORING MODEL ==================== - **Technical Roles**: - Role Fit and Core Skills: 50 - Experience Impact: 20 - Projects and Initiative: 15 - Soft Skills: 5 (if relevant) - Academic and Certification Alignment: 10 - **Soft Skill-Oriented Roles**: - Role Fit and Core Skills: 20 - Experience Impact: 20 - Soft Skills: 40 - Academic and Certification Alignment: 10 - Projects and Initiative: 10 - **Academic and Certification-Driven Roles**: - Role Fit and Core Skills: 20 - Experience Impact: 15 - Academic and Certification Alignment: 40 - Projects and Initiative: 10 - Soft Skills: 5 (if relevant) Mapping: - score < 50 ‚Üí not_recommended - 50‚Äì69 ‚Üí consider - ‚â• 70 ‚Üí highly_recommended ==================== OUTPUT SCHEMA ==================== { "structured": { "name": string | null, "contact": { "email": string | null, "phone": string | null, "linkedin": string | null, "github": string | null, "portfolio": string | null }, "location": { "city": string | null, "country": string | null }, "current_title": string | null, "total_experience_years": number | null, "education": [ { "degree": string | null, "institution": string | null, "year": number | null } ], "experience": [ { "title": string | null, "company": string | null, "start_year": number | null, "end_year": number | "Present" | null, "highlights": [string] } ], "skills": [string], "tools": [string], "certifications": [ { "name": string | null, "issuer": string | null, "year": number | null } ], "languages": [string], "projects": [ { "name": string | null, "description": string | null, "tech": [string] } ] }, "analysis": { "score": number, "score_breakdown": { "role_fit_and_core_skills": number, "experience_impact": number, "performance_productivity": number, "retention_engagement_indicators": number, "leadership_collaboration": number, "education_certifications": number, "projects_initiative": number }, "seniorityLevel": string, "recommendation": "not_recommended" | "consider" | "recommended" | "highly_recommended", "insights": { "strengths": [string], "weaknesses": [string] } }, "ai_insights": { "matched_job_titles": [string], "ai_thought": string, "suggested_next_roles": [string] } } ==================== FINAL TASK ==================== 1. Extract structured resume data. 2. Analyze job nature and requirements. 3. Score resume based on adaptive criteria. 4. Provide insights 5. Produce recommendation. 6. Return exactly one valid JSON object.

Resume:
Haneen Mostafa AbdelBary
üìç6th of October City, Egypt | +20 1005033699 | haninmoustafa0@gmail.com
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Motivated and adaptable graduate with a degree in Russian and English Languages, and
proven experience in customer service, telesales, and education. Skilled in communication,
sales negotiation, and digital tools. Passionate about continuous learning, achieving results, and
excelling in dynamic environments.
KEY SKILLS
- Customer Relationship Management (CRM)
- Sales Negotiation & Deal Closing
- Communication & Interpersonal Skills
- Problem-Solving & Conflict Resolution
- Time Management & Multitasking
- Administrative Support & Coordination
- Team Coaching & Development
- Microsoft Office & Google Workspace
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
- Senior Telesales (International Account) - Trade Show Planners, Hotel Services, 6th
October City. November 2024 - Present
- Handled telesales operations for clients in the US and Canada.
-- 1 of 3 -- Consistently exceeded sales targets and ensured high customer satisfaction.
- Trained and mentored junior team members on effective phone techniques, objection
handling, and performance improvement.
- Student Activities Specialist - Uppingham Cairo School, New Giza.
September 2024 - November 2024
- Organized and coordinated student activities and events.
- Collaborated with teachers and staff to enhance student engagement.
- HR Intern - Power House(IndustrialOrganization).
Summer 2022
- Assisted with recruitment processes and maintained employee records.
- Supported administrative HR tasks and day-to-day operations.
- Russian Language Tutor - Private Tutoring. 2022 - Present
- Teaching beginner Russian to children using engaging and interactive methods.
- Math Assistant Teacher (Part-time) - Private School.
2021 - 2024
- Supported math teachers in delivering lessons for three years.
EDUCATION
Ain Shams University - Faculty of Al-Alsun (Languages)
- Major: Russian & English Languages
- Graduated: 2025 | GPA: Good
CERTIFICATIONS & TRAINING
- Diploma in Digital Marketing
-- 2 of 3 -- Completed Course in Modern and Digital Sales Techniques
LANGUAGES
- Arabic: Native
- English: Excellent
- Russian: Very Good
-- 3 of 3 --
